titles.title: A bill to require a national economic security strategy, and for other purposes.
National Economic Security Strategy Act of 2018
National Economic Security Strategy Act of 2018
National Economic Security Strategy Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
National Economic Security Strategy Act of 2018
This bill requires the President to set forth a national economic security strategy to support the national security strategy.
